description: Details required for Condition 3 (External Materials) of planning permission 20/01857/HOU (Erection of a first floor extension to existing bungalow)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided with regards to Condition 3 (External Materials) of planning permission 20/01857/HOU. Therefore the proposal fails to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.The condition requires the submission of the followingThe development shall be constructed in accordance with the following details which shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to above ground works and shall thereafter be permanently retained:(a) materials for all external finishes (including their manufacturer(s) specification, dimensions, colour and texture).(b) boundary treatment, (including walls, fences and gates) with regards to their manufacturer(s) specification, dimensions, colour and texture)For any future submission please ensure a Plan is submitted showing where on the development the materials would be used.
